name: TOUGE PROJECT: RACE AND DRIFT+
description: Immerse yourself in the world of racing fast cars on night touge. Participate in racing, drifting, improve your skills in practice mode, and compete with friends on one device. Buy and tune your car in career mode. 10 cars, 11 tracks included.  All this in the new racing game TOUGE PROJECT: Race and Drift. Also you can try free version of the game.
